strings.str_0: Henry Tendy is the most infamous soldier.

strings.str_1: Henry Tendey was born in Leamington, in 1891. He soon became a soldier for the british army.

strings.str_2: In 1914 the world war 1 began and Henry was sent to the front.

strings.str_3: Henry fought really hard, fearless of what could happend to him.

strings.str_4: During the Battle of the Somme in 1916, he took so many risks to defend his country that he was shot to the chest and severely wounded.

strings.str_5: Fortunately, Henry survived and could return to the combat in 1917.

strings.str_6: For this battle of the Somme, but also for other battles he fought after,

strings.str_7: Henry soon became the most decorated British Soldier.

strings.str_8: But, Henry made a huge mistake.

strings.str_9: During an operation in the french village of Marcoing,

strings.str_10: a weary German soldier wandered into Tandey's line of fire.

strings.str_11: The enemy was wounded and did not appear to have a weapon.

strings.str_12: And Tandey chose not to shoot.

strings.str_13: The German soldier saw him lower his rifle and nodded his thanks before wandering off.

strings.str_14: But unfortunately for Henry, that soldier is purported to have been

strings.str_0: Alan Turing was a war hero.

strings.str_1: He cracked the famous Nazi encryption code enigma and help in the victory of the allies.

strings.str_2: Alan Turing was a brilliant mathematician. He was born in London in 1912 and studied at both Princeton and Cambridge universities.

strings.str_3: In 1939 he took a full time role where he started to work on the military codes used by Germany.

strings.str_4: The Enigma was a type of enciphering machine used by the German armed forces to send messages securely

strings.str_5: The Germans were increasing its security by changing the cipher system daily

strings.str_6: This made the task of understanding the code almost impossible

strings.str_7: Turing travelled to the United States in December 1942

strings.str_8: , to advise US military intelligence in the use of Bombe machines and to share his knowledge of Enigma

strings.str_9: This helped a lot the allies in fighting the enemy and winning the war

strings.str_10: A great movie about Turing's life is The Imitation Game, you should watch it, Now you know why
